Html: Can somebody bother and explain how to use it ? Please it's very urgent

Give command -

VSTSUnitTestReport.exe <trx file path> <output file name with path> <coverage file path>

some hints:
<output file name path> - output file name to be generated should be given
<coverage file path> - .coverage file should be given. This file will be inside 'In' directory

Consider the example below -

VSTSUnitTestReport.exe C:\PROJ_SYS\bin\debug\TestResults\sampleTest.trx C:\bin\sampleTest.html C:\PROJ_SYS\bin\debug\TestResults\admin_BLRNR8L0B0H 2014-12-09 13_57_48\In\BLRNR8L0B0H\data.coverage
